TEXT.S:
Alexis Ajinça
u siwkay niza tatama, nalecuhan i 1988 amihcan 5 a bulad 6 a demiad, Alexis Ajinça, miunduay, mimali i Amilika NBA. u France kanatal a tademaw ciniza. 2008 a mihcan, mapili' nu Siyalothe Sanmaw putiput. ayza sa mimali i Niwauoliang Tihu putiput.
kakuniza kalunasulitan-sulu u sulit nu Hulam atu Amilika ·NBA2008NBA120 Alexis Ajinça is a French professional basketball player for the New Orleans Pelicans of the National Basketball Association (NBA). He is a 7 ft 2 in (2.18 m), 248 lb (112 kg) center.
